TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Manage radio channel states and interactions

Tunable.name: channel_state
Tunable.description: The state used to populate the radio stations

Tunable.name: immediate
Tunable.description: If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating. This is passed down to the audio state when it is triggered, and thus will overwrite any tuning on the state value.

TunableList.name: listen_affordances
TunableList.description: An ordered list of affordances that define 'listening' to this stereo. The first succeeding affordance is used.

Tunable.name: off_state
Tunable.description: The channel that represents the off state.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected. This is passed down to the audio state when it is triggered, and thus will overwrite any tuning on the state value.

TunableList.name: unavailable_channels
TunableList.description: Items in this list that past tests will not be available, even if the whitelist is empty.

TunableList.name: channel_states
TunableList.description: If the test passes, channel states in this list will be not be available.

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description: Tests for unavailable channel states. Note that we also have tests on listen affordances, please make sure they are not duplicated so to save performance.

TunableList.name: whitelist_channels
TunableList.description: This acts like a filter. Items in this list who pass their test will be combined together and become a whitelist. We will check against this whitelist to generate available picker channel states. If this list is empty, the filter will be disabled.

TunableList.name: channel_states
TunableList.description: If the test passes, channel states in this list will be in the whitelist and become available.

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description: Tests for whitelist channel states. Note that we also have tests on listen affordances, please make sure they are not duplicated so to save performance.
